alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:14PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong winds from distant thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 600 PM MST... At 513 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong winds along a line extending from near New River to El Mirage to near Palo Verde. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Waddell, Laveen, Cashion, Sun City, New River, Sun City West, Litchfield Park, Cave Creek and Carefree. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 111 and 144. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 199 and 228. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 5 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
